title: Letter “Z” with a sleight curve
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065606im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Z_6229.jpg)

Is there a sans serif font were the top and bottom horizontal parts are not straight across but have a sleight curve to them.

Thanks
author: juano

comments.content:
I am working on one. What do you need it for?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090614065606im_/http:/typophile.com/files/zw_4955.png)
I need it for a logo

Thanks, Bendy. The rest still needs attention :)  
John, I might be able to set it for you or let you have a pre-release version of the font. If you wish, my contact is in my profile.
There’s some really funky stuff going on here on Typophile. Any chance of a bigger preview?
